8F77305CBCCD41CBABFB14D294B1A348.description: Protecting Against Risk Achievement Standard: Analyze choices available to consumers for protection against risk and financial loss.

A0E2B5D6D1AF46B19A4C9CFE128B4C7A.description: Using Credit Achievement Standard: Analyze factors that affect the choice of credit, the cost of credit, and the legal aspects of using credit.

2554BE51B852464090ACA76D63107452.description: Banking and Financial Institutions Achievement Standard: Evaluate services provided by financial deposit institutions to transfer funds.

9CED65760D8940B0AFF8A4B09D837C9E.description: Buying Goods and Services Achievement Standard: Apply a decision-making model to maximize consumer satisfaction when buying goods and services.

CF7E8D95CBA940A993DA8FC288E9656A.description: Saving and Investing Achievement Standard: Evaluate savings and investment options to meet short- and long-term goals.

82AC8E00786C42A691C93D82603FABBC.description: Managing Finances and Budgeting Achievement Standard: Develop and evaluate a spending/savings plan.

620106724C414483A6AED890418D8123.description:
Earning and Reporting Income
Achievement Standard: Identify various forms of income and analyze factors that affect income as a part of the career decision-making process.

8DAA8A98B7AE46E7AB30BEF453C57EDB.description: Personal Decision Making Achievement Standard: Use a rational decision-making process as it applies to the roles of citizens, workers, and consumers.
